name: Whiteout (itch) (SpencerWF)
description:
A Pico-8 game, designed to be played on the mobile phone, the objective is to fill each screen in with white.  Each level of the game has a different set of rules to get to this same conclusion.  So far the game only has sounds for the intro as I'm going to do the rest of the sounds all together at the end.

Inspired by Bart Bonte's games.  He has developed 3 similar but far larger games than this.  I recommend checking out his games.
